document.full_text: restaurant chains will have to tell you how many calories are in your sandwich, your milk shake and even your bag of chips by the middle of next year as part of the u.s. government's fight against obesity.
document.title: what's in your sandwich? u.s. wants you to know
lines_and_colors: restaurant chains will have to tell you how many calories are in your sandwich, your milk shake and even your bag of chips by the middle of next year as part of the u.s. government's fight against obesity.
